name: Ho Chi Minh Cubic 2014

venue.name: Convention Center, Trung Vuong Emergency Center (Hoi truong Benh Vien Cap Cuu Trung Vuong)
venue.details: Please park your vehicles in the To Hien Thanh gate. The Convention Center is in next to the Canteen

information:
Special competition for Cubic-like puzzles only. From 2x2 to 5x5.
Open to all competitors
